import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css'; function Dashboard() { const server = "http://localhost:3001" const [students, setStudents] = useState([]); function handleAddStudent(event) { const {id,value} = event.target setAddStudent(prevState=>({...prevState,[id]:value})) console.log(addStudent) console.log(students) } function addStudentToDB(event) { var response fetch(`${server}/api/students`, {method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(addStudent)}).then(res => res.json()).then(data => response=data) if (response.message === "Student created successfully") { event.target.value= setTimeout(() => {event.target.value = response.message;}, 2000) } else { event.target.value= setTimeout(() => {event.target.value = response.message;}, 2000) } }; useEffect(()=> { fetch(`${server}/api/students`, {method: 'GET', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}}) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setStudents(data.map((student) => ({...student, ['checked']:false})))) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) const [addStudent, setAddStudent] = useState({show:false,name:null, _id: null, joining: null, gpa: null, section: null,program:null}); return (
